extendedInfo.description: Containing hours upon hours of content, resources, and information for medicinal marijuana users to make you a Smoking Guru. Don't be the last of your friends to have this awesome app!NOW with Pocket Change. Earn REAL rewards just for using the app everyday. Check out the Pocket Change store at the bottom of the main menu to learn about the kinds of rewards you can earn FREE! Please note that this is not an advertisement and we do not earn ANY revenue from them. This was placed in so you guys wouldn't miss out on FREE rewards that the Lite version was getting. If you would like it removed please write in and I will do so. Some Permissions were added and they are ONLY utilized for Pocket Change.Contains:Strain Library: 200 different strains to look through. Find out loads of information about each as well pictures. Even more Strains coming soon!Favorite Strains: Do you have a favorite strain? You can submit it along with the reason why it is your favorite and you may just see it on the app.The Facts: Have you heard people say that Marijuana causes cancer or that you can die from just one use? Well now you will know the truth and have the information you need to make your defense.Cookbook: Are you a medicinal user that does not like to smoke your medicine? Well this section is for you. Learn to make more than 40 recipes!Maps: Find clinics and dispensaries in your area quickly!Dictionary- Are you confused when it comes to the lingo and slang? Look through this section to find out the definitions of some of the most commonly used words.We love to hear from Handbook users like yourself. If you have any questions, comments, concerns, or suggestions we would love to hear from you. Drop us a line at MarijuanaHandbook@gmail.comThere are plenty, plenty of updates coming to this version.Updates Coming Soon:-Increased Strain Library-New Cookbook RecipesIf you have any questions, comments, concerns, suggestions, or submissions please send them to MarijuanaHandbook@gmail.com TAGS: cannabis, strain, maps, weed, ganja, bud, marijuana, bong, joint, piece, smoke, stoned, stoner, stoners handbook, tobacco, cigarette, hookah, shisha(c) 2012-13 Fallacy Studios

reviews.title: Not bad but not that good either
reviews.comment: No uses section for the strains and the cannabutter recipe is horrible they dont even use a double boiler in it so you could possibly burn up the thc and ruin it...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: this is the best app ever
reviews.author: A Google User
